title: Clinical Knowledge and Practical Skills Assessment Program for Hospital Pharmacists

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmaceutical knowledge and basic concepts of patient management
context.additional_context: Acquisition of methods to evaluate clinical competencies of hospital pharmacists in PBL-based simulation environments by learners in pre-service/in-service teacher roles

learning_goals: Learners can analyze patient cases related to various body systems to make clinical decisions.
Learners can enhance their ability to interpret data for developing medication use assessment and monitoring plans.
Learners can propose personalized treatment plans through evidence-based clinical evaluations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
